thread.title: Happy 100th birthday, Ingrid Bergman: 'Casablanca' to play in Warwick
thread.title_full: Happy 100th birthday, Ingrid Bergman: 'Casablanca' to play in Warwick

title: Happy 100th birthday, Ingrid Bergman: 'Casablanca' to play in Warwick
text: Posted Oct. 6, 2015 at 12:01 AM Posted Oct. 6, 2015 at 12:01 AM WARWICK, R.I. -- The Rhode Island Swedish Heritage Association will have a special showing of the classic film "Casablanca" starring Humphrey Bogart, Ingrid Bergman and Paul Henreid. This is the centennial year of the birth of Swedish actress Bergman, born Aug. 29, 1915 in Stockholm. To commemorate the anniversary, the association will screen her memorable movie role of Ilse Laszlo in the 1942 film. Kendall Svengalis, the group's president, will give a brief overview of Bergmanâ€™s life and career and place the film in historical context. The showing will take place on Thursday, Oct. 8, at 6:30 p.m. at the Warwick Public Library, 600 Sandy Lane, Warwick. The event is free, and refreshments will be provided. providencejournal.com
